trans-unit.source: Represents the construction call request of an object.
trans-unit.target: 表示对象的结构调用请求。

trans-unit.source: When the user creates an instance of a new client-activated object by calling `new` or <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and before the thread returns to the user code, a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage> is sent to the remote application.
trans-unit.target: 当用户创建新的客户端激活对象的实例通过调用`new`或<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和线程返回到用户代码中之前,<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage>发送到远程应用程序。

trans-unit.source: When the construction message arrives at the remote application, it is processed by a remoting activator (either the default one, or one that is specified in the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage.Activator%2A> property) and a new object is created.
trans-unit.target: 在构造消息到达远程应用程序，它由远程处理激活器中处理 (一个，或一个，指定在默认<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage.Activator%2A>属性) 并且创建一个新的对象。

trans-unit.source: The remoting application then returns a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage> to the local application.
trans-unit.target: 在远程处理应用程序然后返回<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage>到本地的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage> contains an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>, which packages information about the remote object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage>包含的实例<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>的包有关远程对象的信息。

trans-unit.source: The remoting infrastructure converts the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef> instance into a proxy to the remote object, which is returned to the user code.
trans-unit.target: 远程处理基础结构将转换<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>到的远程对象，返回到用户代码的代理的实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the remote object to activate.
trans-unit.target: 获取要激活的远程对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the remote object to activate.
trans-unit.target: 要激活的远程对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: For operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the full type name of the remote type to activate.
trans-unit.target: 获取要激活的远程类型的完整类型名称。

trans-unit.source: The full type name of the remote type to activate.
trans-unit.target: 要激活的远程类型的完整类型名称。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: For operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activator that activates the remote object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置激活远程对象的激活器。

trans-unit.source: The activator that activates the remote object.
trans-unit.target: 激活远程对象的激活器。

trans-unit.source: A chain of activators that are arranged in a hierarchy typically completes the various tasks that are involved in the activation process.
trans-unit.target: 一串通常排列在层次结构中的激活完成激活过程中涉及的各种任务。

trans-unit.source: If you intend to plug in a custom activator, then you should traverse the activator hierarchy and plug in your activator at the appropriate location.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要插入自定义激活器，然后应遍历激活器层次结构，并插入激活器在适当的位置。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IActivator.NextActivator%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property on the activator that is returned by the current property to traverse the chain of activators.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IActivator.NextActivator%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>上激活器要遍历激活器链的当前属性所返回的属性。

trans-unit.source: If you add your own activator into the message's activator chain on the client side, the activator may be serialized and transported to the server side, if deemed necessary.
trans-unit.target: 如果到客户端上的消息的激活器链添加你自己激活器，则可以序列化激活器，并将其传输到服务器端中，如果认为有必要。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, custom activators should be fairly lightweight in terms of serialization requirements.
trans-unit.target: 因此，自定义激活器应该在序列化要求方面相当轻量。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: For operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the call site activation attributes.
trans-unit.target: 获取调用站点激活特性。

trans-unit.source: The call site activation attributes.
trans-unit.target: 调用站点激活特性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage.CallSiteActivationAttributes%2A> indexer allows you to specify additional attributes to use during object activation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage.CallSiteActivationAttributes%2A>索引器允许你指定要在对象激活过程中使用的其他属性。

trans-unit.source: The user specifies the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage.CallSiteActivationAttributes%2A> in the `activationAttributes` parameter to <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 用户指定<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage.CallSiteActivationAttributes%2A>中`activationAttributes`参数<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: For operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of context properties that define the context in which the object is to be created.
trans-unit.target: 获取上下文属性的列表，这些属性定义要在其中创建对象的上下文。

trans-unit.source: A list of properties of the context in which to construct the object.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中构造对象的上下文的属性列表。

trans-unit.source: A new object's context is generally chosen based on metadata attributes of the class.
trans-unit.target: 新对象的上下文通常基于类的元数据特性进行选择。

trans-unit.source: The context selection mechanism is extensible through custom attributes, also known as static context properties, which are compiled into the class metadata.
trans-unit.target: 上下文选择机制是可扩展的通过自定义特性，也称为静态上下文属性，被编译到的类元数据。

trans-unit.source: When activating an object remotely, the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage.ContextProperties%2A> contains the list of properties that were contributed by various attributes in the construction call message.
trans-unit.target: 远程激活对象时<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage.ContextProperties%2A>包含由各种特性构造调用消息中提供的属性的列表。

trans-unit.source: These properties are used to create the context in which the server object is activated.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性用于创建在其中激活该服务器对象的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: For operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
